frontendData.title: Who is a full-stack developer?
frontendList: Know at least how to host a database driven application on the web

roadmapData.title: FrontEnd RoadMap
roadmapData.subtitle: Topic We will cover in frontend Series

steps.name: HTML
steps.text: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the code that is used to structure a web page and its content

steps.name: CSS
steps.text: CSS is the language we use to style a Web page.

steps.name: JAVASCRIPT
steps.text: Javascript is used by programmers across the world to create dynamic and interactive web content like applications and browsers.

steps.name: REACT JS
steps.text: React is a declarative, efficient, and flexible JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

steps.name: NEXT JS
steps.text: It lets you build server-side rendering and static web applications using React

questions.question: what is prerequisite to Follow this Series?
questions.answer: Nothing,Only require is your time and Dedication to become a fronted devloper

questions.question: Which frameWork we use in the frontend series?
questions.answer: For frontend We have many framework like(Angular,Reactjs).But in this series We use React js ,Because this is more demanding framework in the present time

questions.question: How this frontend Series is better than others ?
questions.answer: In this series we mainly focus on project.By real world projects you learn easily and getting intersting.

questions.question: Which Plateform you use For write Code ?
questions.answer: In this Series I am using visual studio code For codding.

questions.question: where you upload the video of this fronted series ?
questions.answer: The frontend series will be uploaded on this site and also on Yotube ,So you can watch this course on Youtube and this site also.
